column6: { Class A of feature FeatureA2 accesses the super constructor public B() which is accessible via class B.Class A of feature FeatureA extends class B. The information that class A extends class B is only present in feature FeatureA.}

{ Class A of feature FeatureA2 accesses (by an implicit cast/in the type hierarchy) the type public class B { ... } which is accessible via class B.Class A of feature FeatureA extends class B. The information that class A extends class B is only present in feature FeatureA.}

{ Class A of feature FeatureA2 accesses the method public void foo() { ... } which is accessible via class B.Class A of feature FeatureA extends class B. The information that class A extends class B is only present in feature FeatureA.}
